title: riven now gains edge as she fights
body:
this is it. this is the change that makes riven the most cancerous champ in the game.
they actually added a resource called edge.
she is the embodiment of 14 year olds all across the planet.
http://www.surrenderat20.net/2015/09/930-pbe-update.html

replies.body: {{champion:92}} now takes -0 skill to play and is more OP......10/10
love the pun though- when she's out of combat, she loses her edge XD
These changes sound pretty fun, it's a shame that they won't make it to the game because all the Riven "mains" will cry about it now that Riven actually has counterplay.
